dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "Looks like someone tried to *reconc..."
dialogueTree.text: Looks like someone tried to *reconceptualize* their business here.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Look: The skis and rotor blades bot..."
links.text: Look: The skis and rotor blades both bear the same "Slipstream" logo. It seems likely that they started out making one, failed to turn a profit, and then pivoted to producing the other.

links.title: You: "But the question is -- which did th..."
links.text: But the question is -- which did they start with, and which did they pivot to?

links.title: You: "What a strange leap of imagination...."
links.text: What a strange leap of imagination... And yet they still failed. How sad. [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "That's just speculation. We don't k..."
links.text: That's just speculation. We don't know anything for sure. [Finish thought.]

links.title: Conceptualization: "Not quite. You *do* know that there..."
links.text: Not quite. You *do* know that there's something unusual about this company's business model...
